Subjects: devil, speech of a; sermons, verse in
_description: Words of a tempter or demon in a narratio gestis Romanorum in a Latin prose sermon — three couplets

CULGg626.Transcription:
Who so with me playth fastHis play schall not longe lastWho so
                    þat me playth wythHis name schall sone wide be kytheWho so
                    þat my play schall lerneMore & more my play schall
                    yerne
